item.title: ☀️ Rasperino Solare (and other experiments gone wrong)
item.description: Caution The content of this page has been entirely machine-translated into English, from Italiano. Therefore, it might contain any kind of errors. A few months ago I bought a small monocrystalline solar panel online, with dimensions similar to those of an A4 sheet, for the figure of around €20 (on Amazon.it the sellers are all thieves, on Aliexpress it would have cost a little less). ![Screenshot of a photo sent in chat.
